title: metaplefinance
author: metaplefinance
content: METAPLE is delighted to announce that its new play to earn crypto platform Meta Mojo will be live soon. Metamojo is currently in a ‘Testing period’ which will end on 5th August 2022.This gaming platform will allow you to earn a lot by playing games on the crypto platform. Some of the fantastic games that are listed on this platform currently are American Roulette, Blackjack, Head or Tails, and Horse Racing.Meta Mojo will empower gamers all around the world to participate in these games and earn with their skills. Its official website is live and there are some exciting options and features you will be amazed to know.At the top-left corner you will have three drop down menus, where games, history and leaderboard is listed. Under the games section users will find all the games which are available on the platform.Under history, you can access details of wins and losses. And with the leaderboard you can check who is leading the earning table on the platform.You can connect supported wallets as well with the option available at the top right corner. It is an important step because without connecting the wallet neither you can play the game nor you will receive rewards.The platform will help gamers to show their gaming skills and grab some prizes in the process.Metamojo is one of the products of its parent company named Metaple Finance. Now, this head firm is basically decentralised finance on Binance smart chain.This platform is the open and global financial system that has been built for the era of the internet.Also, this platform brings various advantages that can be compared to authentic financial services. And via the use of distributed systems and smart contracts installing an application of finance or products become less secure and complex.Post development of games the company has put all the games and platform on the testing period and as per official message on the website the testing period is ending on August 5, 2022. Soon the platform will become available for the public.The platform is on its way to upgrading the standard of the modern day gaming industry where metaverse and NFT games are trying to enter. It is also providing a platform to the people to show their talent and skill.People who are interested in trying something new and generating some passive income can visit www.metamojo.ai for more details of Metamojo platform.
